■If the equipment temperature
is wrong, the patties will be
over- or undercooked.

■To ensure food safety, 1/10th
patties should have an
internal temperature of 69°C/
156°F. Correctly setting the
temperature for each product
on the grill is very important.

■Adjust the cooking time as
needed to ensure that the cooked
1/10th patty gets to the right
internal temperature.
■Put dedicated antibacterial wet
wipes by the grill-side freezer.
